tasks.title: Fix Telegram voice messaging
tasks.description: Voice messages currently crash OpenClaw. Need to investigate and fix the crash issue to make voice messaging stable and reliable.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Root cause: OOM killer terminating gateway when whisper loads model. Server has 3.8GB RAM, no swap. Fix: switched to tiny model (73MB vs 139MB base). Config updated and gateway restarted.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Voice message test successful! Received and transcribed without crash. Tiny model fix confirmed working.

tasks.title: Fix Voice Message Gateway Crashes
tasks.description: After 2-3 voice messages, gateway becomes unresponsive and requires restart. Investigate memory/context issues with voice message processing. CRITICAL PRIORITY.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Updated OpenClaw from 2026.1.30 to 2026.2.2-3. This version includes fix #7475 'Media understanding: skip binary media from file text extraction' which should address the voice message context overflow issue.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Stability test in progress: 6/10 voice messages processed successfully with no crashes. Update to 2026.2.2-3 appears to have fixed the issue.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: STABILITY TEST PASSED: 10/10 voice messages processed successfully including a 2.5 minute stress test. Update to 2026.2.2-3 confirmed to fix the binary media context overflow issue. Ready for final approval.

tasks.title: Obsidian Integration Setup
tasks.description: Install Obsidian skill from ClawHub and send voice note explaining Obsidian basics to Anthony

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Sent voice note explaining Obsidian basics. Installed obsidian skill from ClawHub to /root/.openclaw/workspace/skills/obsidian

tasks.title: Remove Done Panel from Mission Control
tasks.description: Remove the 'done' column from Mission Control dashboard - only need backlog, in_progress, and review

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Removed Done column from Mission Control dashboard. Workflow is now: backlog → in_progress → review → archive. Tasks in Review now have an Archive button instead of Done.

tasks.title: Activity Monitor Research & Improvement
tasks.description: Deep research on improving the Agent Activity Monitor. Tasks: 1) Search ClawHub for existing monitoring skills, 2) Web search for activity monitors used with OpenClaw/Clawdbot/Moltbot, 3) Analyze internal logs and system structure, 4) Research tool execution and skill usage visibility, 5) Design visual interface for multi-agent activity with real-time updates, 6) Consider agent communication visualization. Deliverables: Comprehensive PDF report + voice summary under 2 min.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Spawned sub-agent with label 'activity-monitor-research' using github-copilot/claude-opus-4.5. Session: agent:main:subagent:0f85b57b-c943-43b1-808d-e0b3122cd1df

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Sub-agent completed in 3m9s using Opus. Created 11-page PDF report with research from ClawHub, 15+ industry tools, and OpenClaw internals. Key recs: WebSocket tool streaming, skill badges, multi-agent topology view, event batching. Ready for review.

tasks.title: Activity Monitor: Show Model per Agent
tasks.description: Add model name display to each agent pane in the Activity Monitor. Should show: agent name, task, AND the model being used (e.g., claude-opus-4.5, gpt-5.2)

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Spawned sub-agent 'task-006-model-display' with Opus to implement model display feature

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Sub-agent completed. Added model display: blue badges in card headers showing model name, plus brain emoji tags (🧠 claude-opus-4.5) under task items. CSS styled and fallback to 'unknown' if missing.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Anthony reports model display not visible on Activity Monitor. Investigating...

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Wrong file! Changes were made to task-monitor/server.js but Anthony uses /root/.openclaw/workspace/logs/monitor_server.py (Flask). Spawning sub-agent to fix.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Sub-agent 'task-006-fix-correct-file' running with Opus - porting model display to monitor_server.py

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: COMPLETED - Model badges added to monitor_server.py. Updated get_session_labels(), /api/agents, /api/history endpoints + dashboard.html + history.html templates. Service restarted.

tasks.title: Activity Monitor: Agent Communication View
tasks.description: Research and implement a view to watch main agent ↔ sub-agent communication in real-time. Like 'stalking their text messages' - see the actual chat/instructions flowing between agents.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Spawned sub-agent 'task-007-agent-comms' with Opus to implement agent communication view

tasks.title: Activity Monitor: Agent Chats Tab
tasks.description: Add new 'Agent Chats' tab/page to Activity Monitor. Separate from main agents view. Shows clean text conversations between main session and sub-agents - no commands or background stuff, just the dialogue. Visual text chat format showing how agents talk to each other.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Spawned sub-agent 'task-008-agent-chats' with Opus. Creating new /chats route with clean conversation view between main session and sub-agents.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Sub-agent completed. Created /chats route with chat bubble UI, /api/chats endpoint filtering to text-only messages, collapsible conversation cards, auto-refresh. Added Agent Chats tab to main dashboard.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Wrong file! Agent Chats was added to task-monitor/server.js but needs to be in monitor_server.py. Spawned sub-agent to fix.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Sub-agent 'task-008-fix-correct-file' running with Opus - porting Agent Chats to monitor_server.py

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: COMPLETED - Agent Chats page added to monitor_server.py. New /chats route + /api/chats endpoint + chats.html template. Chat bubble UI, sidebar with conversation list, auto-refresh. Nav links added to dashboard.html and history.html. Service restarted.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Anthony feedback: Needs redesign. Current layout not right. Requirements: (1) Main session on RIGHT, sub-agent on LEFT like text messages (2) Vertical rectangular cards like the Active Agents view - one card per sub-agent conversation (3) Newest messages at BOTTOM, scrollable history (4) Show main↔sub-agent dialogue, not user↔assistant. Spawning sub-agent to fix.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Redesign complete. Card-based grid layout matching Active Agents. iMessage-style bubbles (main=right/purple, sub-agent=left/gray). Newest at bottom with scroll. API now returns sender: main/sub-agent. Service restarted.

tasks.title: Agent Chats: Live Status Indicators
tasks.description: Add live/dead status indicators to Agent Chats page: (1) Green indicator for live agents (still active, not expired) (2) Red indicator for dead/expired agents (3) Sort conversations by most recent message - newest at top/left (4) Match active status with Active Agents view threshold timer

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Complete. Added isLive field to API (10-min threshold matching Active Agents). Green pulsing dot for live, red for dead. Status badges. Sorted by most recent first. Service restarted.

tasks.title: Main Session as Manager - Identity File Tuning
tasks.description: Update HEARTBEAT.md, SOUL.md, AGENTS.md to enforce: (1) Main session DELEGATES, never does tasks manually (2) Cruel boss mentality - demand results, no excuses, kill stuck agents (3) Always available to respond to Anthony (4) Mission Control sync every heartbeat (5) Skill creation awareness - suggest skills for repeatable patterns

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Updated all 3 identity files: HEARTBEAT.md (manager mindset, cruel boss supervision, skill awareness), SOUL.md (delegation-first identity, skill-first thinking), AGENTS.md (hierarchy diagram, main session supervision rules). Committed and pushed.

tasks.title: Valentine's Day Ideas for Mom & Grandma
tasks.description: Research calm, peaceful Valentine's ideas for Anthony's mom and grandmother. Requirements: flowers order, something classy, NOT crowded restaurants, can be done at home, easy for older woman (not too much walking), peaceful and simple, handwritten card.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Spawned sub-agent 'task-011-valentines-family' with Opus

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Complete. Full plan: flower recs (pink roses for mom, soft pastels for grandma), order by Feb 10. At-home ideas: afternoon tea, classic movie marathon, family dinner. Gift picks: Recchiuti/See's chocolates, spa items, photo book. Card message suggestions included. Budget est: 50-430.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Spawned sub-agent 'task-011-family-pdf' to create detailed PDF report with all ideas, images, timeline, budget, shopping list

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: PDF complete - 15 pages, 654KB. Includes flowers, gifts, activities, card messages, timeline, 3 budget tiers, shopping checklist. Sent to Anthony.
